metadata.title: CVE-2020-16093 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In LemonLDAP::NG (aka lemonldap-ng) through 2.0.8, validity of the X.509certificate is not checked by default when connecting to remote LDAPbackends, because the default configuration of the Net::LDAPS module forPerl is used.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
